item.description:
Join us as we explore the public and private partnerships designed to restructure education and the economy, ultimately redefining the very nature and purpose of education.

Our discussion will be centered on the book The Deliberate Dumbing Down of America - A Chronological Paper Trail by Charlotte Thomson Iserbyt.

FREE Download of this book in our Files Section .

All are welcome!
Teachers and Parents are strongly urged to attend.
Organic Refreshments will be served.
FREE
PLEASE BRING A FRIEND.

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: The Destruction of America's Education System
